arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
Hitting a Crowd Controlled enemy has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spread the effect.
